alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:22PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mariposa, southwestern Madera, central Merced and northwestern Fresno Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 520 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of La Grange to 10 miles west of Chowchilla. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merced, Atwater, Chowchilla, Livingston, Delhi, Madera Acres, Winton, Planada, Catheys Valley, Le Grand, Ballico and Lake McClure. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling
